mapper.select: select c.comment_no as comment_no, c.comment_content as comment_content, c.comment_regdate as comment_regdate, c.post_no as post_no, c.user_no as user_no, p.user_name as user_name, p.user_profile_url_thumb as user_profile_url from comment c, pikiuser p where c.post_no=#{post_no} and p.user_no=c.user_no

select c.comment_no as comment_no, c.comment_content as comment_content, c.comment_regdate as comment_regdate, c.post_no as post_no, c.user_no as user_no, p.user_name as user_name, p.user_profile_url_thumb as user_profile_url from comment c, pikiuser p where c.post_no=#{post_no} and p.user_no=c.user_no Limit 0,5
mapper.insert: insert into comment(comment_content, comment_regdate, user_no, post_no) values(#{comment_content},sysdate(),#{user_no},#{post_no})
mapper.update: update post set post_comment_count = post_comment_count + 1 where post_no = #{post_no};
update post set post_comment_count = post_comment_count - 1 where post_no = #{post_no};
